::: {.hero}
## Christopher D. Johnston {.hero-name}

**Professor of Political Science and Sociology at Duke University**

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="65%"}
My research and teaching explores the structure and origins of mass belief systems, social and political identities, and models of judgment and decision making.

I co-direct [Worldview Lab](https://kenan.ethics.duke.edu/worldview-lab/) at Duke's Kenan Institute for Ethics.

I am currently associate editor at the journal [*Political Psychology*](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/journal/14679221).
